item.title: TryHackMe - Encryption 101
item.description: Encryption - Crypto 101 Ciphertext - The result of encrypting a plain text, encrypted data Cipher - A method of encrypting or decrypting data.

item.title: TryHackMe - Metasploit
item.description: Metasploit Docs: https://docs.metasploit.com/ Metasploit is the most widely used exploitation framework. Metasploit is a powerful tool that can support all phases of a penetration testing engagement, from information gathering to post-exploitation.
